mapper.insert: INSERT INTO browsing_history (user_id, post_id, browse_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{postId}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE browse_time = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT h.id, h.user_id, h.post_id, h.browse_time, u.nickname AS user_nickname, u.avatar_url AS user_avatar_url FROM browsing_history h LEFT JOIN userss u ON u.id = h.user_id WHERE h.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY h.browse_time DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM browsing_history WHERE user_id = #{userId}
